ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealers (was -Wizards being resisted)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you played on the PvP server you wouldn t have that problem. If someone steals _A_ kill, even one, you ll most likely see the following text shouted out:
ygData.messageBody:
If you played on the PvP server you wouldn't have that problem. If
someone steals _A_ kill, even one, you'll most likely see the following text
shouted out: "Do it again [insert name here] and you die." Usually people
heed that warning, others crawl out of the zone with their lives if they're
lucky.

Re: Cast Force
Magicians have a similar spell, Flame Flux, that does the same amount of
damage. I did 270+ in 1 cast once, very nice. A good spell if you aren't
standing near others not in your group or you don't have pets.

Re: Rune of xxxxxxxxxx
I give all my research items away, unless I'm selling it to someone who
is way lower. I've never seen research components sold in zone Cazic-Thule,
only given away. I have so many words that I don't have space, literally, to
keep anything that won't be useful to me. I've never seen a spell that
couldn't be bought and I've never researched anything because of that, so
research components are worthless (up to now at least).

Hiretsukan
28 Magician
Rellos Zek
